description:
Lawrence reveals Holo`s secret to the manager of Milone Trading Company to gain their help in securing Holo`s escape.  For merchants, money comes first, so why has Medio Trading captured Holo at all? Lawrence must outthink politics to save Holo
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Wolfsgott und das gehorsame Lamm
Ookami no Keshin to Juujun na Kohitsuji
狼の化身と従順な子羊
